metadata.title: CVE-2022-1867 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Data Transfer in GoogleChrome prior to 102.0.5005.61 allowed a remote attacker to bypass sameorigin policy via a crafted clipboard content.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
